remarks: Version of ~ cbv3 with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbv3v.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
bj-cbv3v.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-cbv3v.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-cbv3v $p |- ( A. x ph -> A. y ps ) $.
$d x y $.
